title.name: Contract: Breaking the Unbreakable

title.name: Contract: Death to Darnaw
title.flavour text: If Admiral Darnaw is stupid enough to send orders to his fleet members and not expect us to steal them, then he deserves what's coming to him!

title.name: Contract: Heart of Glory
title.flavour text: A part of me still believes I can convince Nashta to give up her rebellious ways and come home. That part of me will forever be nine years of age, futilely chasing her as she runs off into the dunes yet again.

title.name: Contract: The Slaver King
title.flavour text: There can be no freedom while hate still reigns.

title.name: Contract: The Twins
title.flavour text: The Vox speak in threats. We will answer them with action.

title.name: Controlled Energy

title.flavour text: What we give to others, we also give to ourselves.
title.Mods: +(30-40) to Intelligence,(25-50)% increased Critical Strike Chance,+(1-2) to Level of all Minion Skill Gems,Minions' Base Attack Critical Strike Chance is equal to the Critical Strike Chance of your Main Hand Weapon,26% increased Elemental Damage

title.name: Machina Mitts
title.flavour text: Biology is but a machine, begetting effusion of energies; death is but a curse, that can be given... or reversed.
title.Mods: (200-250)% increased Evasion and Energy Shield,1% of Damage dealt by your Mines is Leeched to you as Life,(30-20)% reduced Recovery rate of Life and Energy Shield,5% increased Recovery rate of Life and Energy Shield per Power Charge,Lose a Power Charge each second if you have not Detonated Mines Recently

title.name: Maelstrm of Chaos
title.flavour text: Whispers from a world apart Speak my name beyond the tomb; Bound within the Maelstrm's heart, Will they grant me strength or doom?
title.Mods: Area has patches of Chilled Ground 20 patches with Ground Effect per 100 tiles (Hidden) Ground Effect has a radius of 14 (Hidden),(40-60)% increased Quantity of Items found in this Area Monsters deal 50% extra Physical Damage as Lightning,Monsters are Immune to randomly chosen Elemental Ailments or Stun,Monsters' Melee Attacks apply random Hexes on Hit,Monsters Reflect Hexes,(200-400)% increased Rarity of Items found in this Area

title.name: Mageblood
title.flavour text: Rivers of power course through your veins.
title.Mods: +(30-50) to Dexterity,+(15-25)% to Fire Resistance,+(15-25)% to Cold Resistance,Magic Utility Flasks cannot be Used,Leftmost (2-4) Magic Utility Flasks constantly apply their Flask Effects to you,Magic Utility Flask Effects cannot be removed,+(25-35) to Strength

title.name: Magna Eclipsis
title.flavour text: Lunaris crossed silently, shining and full, Softly night left her, alone and forlorn. Solaris rose to meet her, feeling her pull. 'Neath the midday sun, the night was reborn.
title.Mods: +2 to Level of Socketed Gems,Triggers Level 20 Elemental Aegis when Equipped,(180-220)% increased Armour,+(60-80) to maximum Life,+(80-100) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield,+(20-30) to maximum Life

title.name: Mahuxotl's Machination
title.flavour text: The Banished Architect sought to employ all the darkest secrets of the Vaal... at the same time.
title.Mods: Corrupted Soul,Divine Flesh,Eternal Youth,Everlasting Sacrifice,Immortal Ambition,Vaal Pact

title.name: Malachai's Artifice
title.flavour text: When the wind blows, Know which way to bend and watch the others break.
title.Mods: Socketed Gems have Elemental Equilibrium,-20% to all Elemental Resistances,+(75-100)% to Fire Resistance when Socketed with a Red Gem,+(75-100)% to Cold Resistance when Socketed with a Green Gem,+(75-100)% to Lightning Resistance when Socketed with a Blue Gem,All Sockets are White,Has 1 Socket

title.name: Malachai's Awakening
title.flavour text: There is no cost too great to pay for power. Merely men who lack the conviction to pay it.
title.Mods: +20 to Strength,(15-30)% increased Spell Damage,+10% to all Elemental Resistances,Adds (42-54) to (78-88) Cold Damage to Spells while no Life is Reserved,Adds (54-64) to (96-107) Fire Damage to Spells while no Life is Reserved,Adds (5-14) to (160-173) Lightning Damage to Spells while no Life is Reserved,Blood Magic

title.name: Malachai's Loop
title.flavour text: Thaumaturgy has no limit. It is our fragile reality that imposes boundaries.
title.Mods: (210-250)% increased Energy Shield,+2 to Maximum Power Charges,20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit,(12-16)% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge,Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges,Shocks you when you reach Maximum Power Charges,(10-15)% increased Spell Damage

title.name: Malachai's Mark
title.flavour text: What man does not wish for immortality?
title.Mods: (80-100)% increased Evasion and Energy Shield,+(60-80) to maximum Life,Gain (15-25) Life per Enemy Killed,Gain (15-25) Energy Shield per Enemy Killed,Grants Malachai's Endurance, Frenzy and Power for 6 seconds each, in sequence

title.name: Malachai's Simula
title.flavour text: It was a sliver of Malachai's soul that animated the first Eternal Guardian.
title.Mods: +20 to Strength,+(20-30)% to Lightning Resistance,Spells have a 20% chance to deal Double Damage,Blood Magic

title.name: Malachai's Vision
title.flavour text: Wicked men chase power like stray dogs chase a rat.
title.Mods: Adds (13-17) to (29-37) Chaos Damage,+(150-200) to maximum Energy Shield,+(32-40)% to Cold Resistance,+(15-20)% to Lightning Resistance,Regenerate 400 Energy Shield per second if all Equipped items are Corrupted,Regenerate 35 Mana per second if all Equipped Items are Corrupted

title.name: Malicious Intent
title.flavour text: Each life taken makes the next a little easier.
title.Mods: 5% chance to Gain Unholy Might for 4 seconds on Melee Kill

title.name: Maligaro's Cruelty
title.flavour text: He does not love. He does not feel regret or remorse. He does not think about consequences, only possibilities. If that does not describe a monster, tell me: what does?  - Archbishop Geofri
title.Mods: (4-8)% increased maximum Life,(25-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by at least 5 Poisons,(12-15)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by fewer than 5 Poisons,10% increased Damage with Poison per Frenzy Charge,3% increased Poison Duration per Power Charge,+(16-24) to Dexterity and Intelligence

title.name: Maligaro's Lens
title.flavour text: Look around you. What do you see?  Corruption, perversion, sin? No. It is progress.  You simply lack the means to see it.   - Inquisitor Maligaro
title.Mods: (10-15)% increased Attack Speed,(10-20)% increased maximum Life,-50% to all Elemental Resistances,10% increased Area of Effect,Nearby allies Recover 1% of your Maximum Life when you Die,+3% chance to Suppress Spell Damage

title.name: Maligaro's Restraint
title.flavour text: Our genius will pave the way forward. May all who are worthy be improved!  - Inquisitor Maligaro
title.Mods: Adds 1 to (30-50) Lightning Damage to Attacks,100% increased Shock Duration on you,Shocks you cause are reflected back to you,60% increased Damage while Shocked,15% increased Movement Speed while Shocked,+(9-20) to maximum Energy Shield

title.name: Maligaro's Virtuosity
title.flavour text: Maligaro operated effortlessly, with great speed and terrible consequences.
title.Mods: +(20-30) to Dexterity,5% increased Attack Speed,50% increased Global Critical Strike Chance,(60-80)% increased Evasion Rating,Your Critical Strike Multiplier is 300%

title.name: Maloney's Mechanism
title.flavour text: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering; a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel. I will see them again, but not until my work is done.
title.Mods: Has 2 Sockets,Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown,(7-12)% increased Attack Speed,+(50-70) to maximum Life,5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks,Has 1 Socket

title.name: Maloney's Nightfall
title.flavour text: Fear not the dark, the song of night, Hear not the arch, the falling cry. My giving sun, fight no more, Rest alone, my grand nightfall.
title.Mods: 10% increased Attack Speed,+(50-70) to maximum Life,+(12-16)% to Chaos Resistance,(8-10) to (14-16) Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks,25% chance to create a Smoke Cloud when Hit,(40-60)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies,Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

title.name: Manastorm
title.flavour text: Fear not the fury of the storm.
title.Mods: (80-120)% increased Energy Shield,+(50-70) to maximum Mana,(30-50)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate,When you Cast a Spell, Sacrifice all Mana to gain Added Maximum Lightning Damage equal to 25% of Sacrificed Mana for 4 seconds,(5-10)% increased Spell Damage

title.name: Mantra of Flames
title.flavour text: The strong grow stronger still.
title.Mods: Adds (3-5) to (8-12) Fire Attack Damage per Buff on you,Adds (2-3) to (5-8) Fire Spell Damage per Buff on you

title.name: Mantra of Force
title.flavour text: The strong grow stronger still.

title.name: Mao Kun
title.flavour text: The Treasures of the Tides wait in agony at the End of the World.
title.Mods: (70-90)% increased Quantity of Items found in this Area (60-100)% increased Experience gain,30% increased Quantity of Items found in this Area Monsters deal (175-190)% extra Physical Damage as Lightning,Monsters gain an Endurance Charge on Hit,Monsters gain a Power Charge on Hit

title.name: March of the Legion
title.flavour text: When the time comes to face evil, the faithful are never alone.
title.Mods: +(3-5) to Level of Socketed Aura Gems,Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 25 Divine Blessing,(250-300)% increased Armour and Energy Shield,+(12-18)% to all Elemental Resistances,(20-30)% increased Movement Speed

title.name: Mark of Submission
title.flavour text: So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark, that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.
title.Mods: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit,Has 1 Socket

title.name: Mark of the Doubting Knight
title.flavour text: Nothing is pure. Slice open the Innocent And spill a thousand Sins.
title.Mods: +5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding,(250-270)% increased Physical Damage,10% reduced Attack Speed,+(6-10)% to all Elemental Resistances,50% chance to Cause Bleeding on Critical Strike,50% chance to Cause Poison on Critical Strike,50% increased Global Critical Strike Chance

title.name: Mark of the Elder
title.flavour text: Be not stirred by the Void.
title.Mods: 20% chance to Trigger Level 20 Tentacle Whip on Kill,Adds (26-32) to (42-48) Cold Damage to Attacks,(6-10)% increased maximum Energy Shield,(6-10)% increased maximum Life,(60-80)% increased Attack Damage if your other Ring is a Shaper Item,Cannot be Stunned by Attacks if your other Ring is an Elder Item,Adds (3-4) to (10-14) Physical Damage to Attacks

title.name: Mark of the Red Covenant
title.flavour text: Gleeful are the few who bask in the blood of many.
title.Mods: +(30-50) to maximum Energy Shield,Summoned Raging Spirits deal (175-250)% increased Damage,75% reduced Maximum number of Summoned Raging Spirits,Summoned Raging Spirits' Hits always Ignite,Summoned Raging Spirits' Melee Strikes deal Fire-only Splash Damage to Surrounding Targets

title.name: Mark of the Shaper
title.flavour text: Let madness take control.
title.Mods: 20% chance to Trigger Level 20 Summon Volatile Anomaly on Kill,Adds (13-18) to (50-56) Lightning Damage to Spells,(6-10)% increased maximum Energy Shield,(6-10)% increased maximum Life,(60-80)% increased Spell Damage if your other Ring is an Elder Item,Cannot be Stunned by Spells if your other Ring is a Shaper Item,(15-25)% increased Elemental Damage

title.name: Marohi Erqi
title.flavour text: Lumbering as a sea lion, clumsy as a berry-drunk pigeon. That was Erqi.  It mattered little. When Erqi's maul fell true, so did its target.
title.Mods: (500-600)% increased Physical Damage,25% reduced Attack Speed,(40-50)% increased Stun Duration on Enemies,-500 to Accuracy Rating,45% increased Stun Duration on Enemies

title.name: Martial Artistry
title.flavour text: A gentle hand rarely leaves a mark on the world.
title.Mods: +(0.3-0.4) metres to Melee Strike Range while Unarmed,Passive Skills in Radius also grant: 1% increased Unarmed Attack Speed with Melee Skills

title.name: Martyr of Innocence
title.flavour text: You have been found guilty. Let the fires cleanse you of your sins.
title.Mods: Grants Level 15 Vengeance Skill,+(12-16)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff,100% increased Fire Damage,Adds (315-360) to (450-540) Fire Damage,Battlemage,Damage Penetrates 15% of Fire Resistance if you have Blocked Recently,Immune to Freeze and Chill while Ignited,+18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

title.name: Martyr's Crown
title.flavour text: Let it pierce you, let blood flow. Make more room for the soul to grow.
title.Mods: +(110-130) to maximum Energy Shield,Reflects 5 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers,Pain Attunement

title.name: Marylene's Fallacy
title.flavour text: Marylene stroked the medallion at her breast before every duel and every cast of the die.  - Victario, the People's Poet
title.Mods: +(80-120) to Accuracy Rating,+(210-240)% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier,+(80-100) to Evasion Rating,(10-15)% increased Light Radius,40% less Critical Strike Chance,Critical Strikes have Culling Strike,+(20-30) to Intelligence

title.name: Mask of the Spirit Drinker
title.flavour text: Our flesh is our most sacred gift. Taint it not with the occult.
title.Mods: (140-220)% increased Armour and Energy Shield,+(30-60) to maximum Energy Shield,+(80-100) to maximum Life,Your Energy Shield starts at zero,Cannot gain Energy Shield,Regenerate 50 Life per second if you have at least 500 Maximum Energy Shield,Regenerate 100 Life per second if you have at least 1000 Maximum Energy Shield,Regenerate 150 Life per second if you have at least 1500 Maximum Energy Shield

title.name: Mask of the Stitched Demon
title.flavour text: From the flesh of the gods, Xibaqua was born. From the carnage of Xibaqua, we were born. It is our duty to return to the gods what was once theirs.
title.Mods: +(40-50) to Intelligence,+(160-180) to maximum Energy Shield,Strength provides no bonus to Maximum Life,Intelligence provides no inherent bonus to Maximum Mana,+1 to Maximum Life per 2 Intelligence,Your Energy Shield starts at zero,Cannot gain Energy Shield,Regenerate 1% of Life per second per 500 Maximum Energy Shield

title.name: Mask of the Tribunal
title.flavour text: The judge determines worthiness by comparison to the paragon: himself.
title.Mods: (150-200)% increased Armour and Energy Shield,Nearby Allies have (4-6)% increased Defences per 100 Strength you have,Nearby Allies have +(6-8)% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 100 Dexterity you have,Nearby Allies have (2-4)% increased Cast Speed per 100 Intelligence you have,2% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills per 250 total Attributes,+(25-30) to all Attributes,(150-200)% increased Armour and Energy Shield,Nearby Allies have 1% Chance to Block Attack Damage per 100 Strength you have,Nearby Allies have +(6-8)% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 100 Dexterity you have,Nearby Allies have (2-4)% increased Cast Speed per 100 Intelligence you have,2% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills per 250 total Attributes

title.name: Matua Tupuna
title.flavour text: You carried me through life, The least I can do is carry you through death.
title.Mods: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems,(40-80)% increased Energy Shield,+(15-25) to maximum Mana,20% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills on your Minions,20% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills,Spreads Tar when you Block,(5-10)% increased Spell Damage

title.name: Maw of Conquest
title.flavour text: Young Napuatzi was thrown into the pits, an unwilling sacrifice, but the offer of her blood was refused. She rose from the pit alive and anew. A Leader. A Conquerer. A Viper.
title.Mods: (60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells,(200-250)% increased Energy Shield,+(50-70) to maximum Life,Unaffected by Poison,(10-20)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life

title.name: Maw of Mischief
title.flavour text: The line that divides hope and fear, life and death, crowd and mob, is as thin as a whisper.
title.Mods: Grants Level 20 Death Wish Skill,+(45-65) to maximum Life,(30-20)% reduced Mana Cost of Minion Skills,Minions are Aggressive,Minions deal (15-20)% increased Damage

title.name: Medved's Challenge
title.flavour text: For forty-two nights, the Feller of Heroes challenged   the next greatest warrior to a one-on-one duel.   None could match his might.
title.Mods: 800% increased Attribute Requirements,(30-50)% increased Ward,+(15-25)% to all Elemental Resistances,80% less Flask Charges gained from Kills,Flasks gain 1 Charge per second if you've Hit a Unique Enemy Recently

title.name: Tasalio's Sign
title.flavour text: A gift from Tasalio, God of Water, to the chieftain Rakiata. Kaom took Rakiata's head and hand so that his warriors' axes might rise and fall like the waves.

title.flavour text: Hyrri and her arrows broke the sacred code, damning herself. Kaom seized her sacrifice, and in doing so, seized victory.  - Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

title.flavour text: Those who could flee did so. The rest fought bravely, and died horrifically.

title.flavour text: The first explorers took to the hills to discover the lay of the land, and watched with wonder as the land undulated, crashed and twisted.

title.name: The Enmity Divine
title.flavour text: <span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG02 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAq ></span><span class= glyph HBG03 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAl ></span> <span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAn ></span><span class= glyph HBG02 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAu ></span><span class= glyph HBG00 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAv ></span> <span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAl ></span><span class= glyph HBG02 ></span><span class= glyph HBG04 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAt ></span> <span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAn ></span><span class= glyph HBG00 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAv ></span><span class= glyph HBG02 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAu ></span><span class= glyph HBG03 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAf ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAn ></span>
title.Mods: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 1 Chance to Bleed,Grants Summon Harbinger of Brutality Skill,+5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff,+(30-40)% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Bleeding from Critical Strikes,Adds (160-185) to (200-225) Physical Damage,(30-40)% increased Critical Strike Chance,+18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

title.name: The Ephemeral Bond
title.flavour text: For how little time they had together, their love was all the more powerful.
title.Mods: (25-40)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate,+(15-25)% to all Elemental Resistances,+(30-40)% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've gained a Power Charge Recently,(1-2) to (36-40) Lightning Damage per Power Charge,90% less Power Charge Duration,+(20-30) to Intelligence

title.name: The Epiphany
title.flavour text: Some artists wait a lifetime for inspiration. He waited for five.
title.Mods: Destroyed on Empowering target Enemy,Map Item Quantity affects number of rewards from Empowered Enemy,Empowered Monsters drop (8-12) Currency Rewards,Empowered Monsters drop (8-12) Divination Card Rewards,Empowered Monsters drop (8-12) Fragment Rewards,Empowered Monsters drop (8-12) Map Rewards,Empowered Monsters drop (8-12) Scarab Rewards,Empowered Monsters drop (8-12) Sentinel Rewards,Empowered Monsters drop (8-12) Unique Rewards

title.name: The Eternal Apple
title.flavour text: The empire is both the tree and the fruit. It provides safe harbour as ideas grow within, and when the time is right, the apple is picked. The idea, and our ideals, take root.
title.Mods: Trigger a Socketed Warcry Skill on losing Endurance Charges, with a 0.25 second Cooldown,+(60-80) to maximum Life,+(17-23)% to Chaos Resistance,You lose all Endurance Charges on reaching maximum Endurance Charges,Cannot Block,50% increased Warcry Cooldown Recovery Rate,(10-15)% increased Spell Damage

title.name: The Eternal Struggle
title.flavour text: Simply the way it must be, so that existence may be.
title.Mods: +(20-50) to Strength,+(20-50) to Dexterity,+(20-50) to Intelligence,(10-15)% increased Global Defences,Critical Strikes inflict Malignant Madness if The Eater of Worlds is dominant,Kill Enemies that have 15% or lower Life on Hit if The Searing Exarch is dominant

title.name: The Eternity Shroud
title.flavour text: There can be no defence against the celestial siblings entropy and time.
title.Mods: Trigger Level 20 Glimpse of Eternity when Hit,(100-150)% increased Evasion and Energy Shield,+(70-100) to maximum Life,+(17-23)% to Chaos Resistance,Gain (3-5)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per Shaper Item Equipped,Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Shaper Items

title.name: The False Hope
title.flavour text: For a time, it was thought this place could seed an empire greater than any in history. The lands could be tamed, and commanded, they thought. But control, like all things in that place, was an illusion.

title.name: The Felbog Fang
title.flavour text: Death creeps closer; unseen, inexorable, hungry.
title.Mods: +(30-50) to Intelligence,(10-15)% increased Cast Speed,(10-15)% increased Area of Effect,Enemies Cursed by you are Hindered if 25% of Curse Duration expired,Your Curses have 25% increased Effect if 50% of Curse Duration expired,Enemies Cursed by you take 35% increased Damage if 75% of Curse Duration expired,+(16-24) to Strength and Dexterity

title.name: The First Crest
title.flavour text: In pursuit of divinity, he tried many times to found a religion. Few followed his initial symbols and proverbs. He needed something greater. A symbol none could deny.  - Lycia, the Heretic
title.Mods: Aureus Coins are converted to Experience upon defeating the Herald of the Scourge,Aureus Coins are converted to Relics upon defeating the Herald of the Scourge,Aureus Coins are converted to Tainted Currency upon defeating the Herald of the Scourge,This item is destroyed when applied to a Sanctum

title.name: The Fledgling
title.flavour text: The single well-placed arrow that changes the world must be preceded by ten thousand practice shots.
title.Mods: (150-200)% increased Armour and Evasion,(30-50)% increased Projectile Speed,(30-50)% increased Projectile Damage,Projectiles cannot collide with Enemies in Close Range,Far Shot

title.name: The Flow Untethered
title.flavour text: <span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG02 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAb ></span><span class= glyph HBG03 ></span><span class= glyph HBG02 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAc ></span><span class= glyph HBG03 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAd ></span> <span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG02 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAb ></span><span class= glyph HBG03 ></span><span class= glyph HBG02 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAc ></span><span class= glyph HBG03 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAe ></span> <span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAf ></span><span class= glyph HBG02 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAg ></span><span class= glyph HBG03 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAb ></span>
title.Mods: Grants Summon Harbinger of Time Skill,(10-15)% increased Attack and Cast Speed,(10-15)% increased Energy Shield Recovery rate (10-15)% increased Life Recovery rate,(15-20)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate,Debuffs on you expire (15-20)% faster,(15-25)% increased Stun and Block Recovery

title.name: The Formless Flame
title.flavour text: Our skin turns to ash and we are swallowed by his brilliant red light.  <span class= tc -help >This item can be transformed with a [[Blessing of Xoph]]</span>
title.Mods: (80-120)% increased Armour,-30% to Fire Resistance,-(200-100) Fire Damage taken from Hits,Armour is increased by Overcapped Fire Resistance

title.name: The Formless Inferno
title.flavour text: He burns us to keep us from harm.
title.Mods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Infernal Legion,+(60-100) to maximum Life,-30% to Fire Resistance,Minion Life is increased by their Overcapped Fire Resistance

title.name: The Fourth Vow
title.flavour text: Seek not to avoid the mortal pains of this world. In flagellation, there lies freedom from temptation.
title.Mods: Physical Damage taken bypasses Energy Shield,(150-250)% increased Armour and Energy Shield,+(17-29)% to Chaos Resistance,Regenerate 3% of Life per second,Armour also applies to Chaos Damage taken from Hits

title.name: The Fracturing Spinner
title.flavour text: <span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAc ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAo ></span> <span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAe ></span><span class= glyph HBG00 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAl ></span> <span class= glyph HBGAa ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAf ></span><span class= glyph HBG02 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAm ></span><span class= glyph HBG03 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAc ></span><span class= glyph HBG01 ></span><span class= glyph HBGAo ></span>
title.Mods: Grants Summon Harbinger of Directions Skill,+(30-50) to Strength and Dexterity,Adds (19-22) to (30-35) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks,Adds (19-22) to (30-35) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks,+(15-25)% to Fire and Cold Resistances,Adds (7-9) to (13-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

title.name: The Front Line
title.flavour text: It was a great honour to fight at the front. The few that survived the initial charge were guaranteed fame and fortune.
title.Mods: Adds Veteran's Awareness

title.name: The Fulcrum
title.flavour text: To stand at the confluence of the elements, the master must achieve perfect balance.
title.Mods: (140-180)% increased Physical Damage,(0-50)% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage,(0-50)% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage,(0-50)% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage,Elemental Ailments you inflict are Reflected to you,Elemental Damage with Hits is Lucky while you are Shocked,Damage Penetrates (8-10)% Elemental Resistances while you are Chilled,Gain (30-40)% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of a random Element while you are Ignited,+20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

title.name: The Geomantic Gyre
title.flavour text: For their mortal allies, the last Titans forged a mighty staff, one that could safely hold the first unearthed virtue gem.
title.Mods: Has 1 Socket,(150-200)% increased Spell Damage,(80-120)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells,+(150-200) to maximum Mana,Gain 150 Life per Enemy Killed,Has a Crucible Passive Skill Tree with only Support Passive Skills Crucible Passive Skill Tree is removed if this Modifier is removed,+18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

title.name: The Ghastly Theatre
title.flavour text: Never let the audience know your true form. Misdirect them, beguile them. Strike when they least expect it.
title.Mods: +2 to Level of Socketed Support Gems,Triggers Level 20 Physical Aegis when Equipped,(300-400)% increased Armour and Evasion,100% chance to Avoid Bleeding,(8-15)% increased Attack and Cast Speed while Physical Aegis is depleted,(50-70)% increased Critical Strike Chance while Physical Aegis is depleted,Nearby Enemies are Blinded while Physical Aegis is not depleted,180% increased Block Recovery

title.name: The Gilded Chalice
title.flavour text: He took the newcomers' symbol and made it his own. Finally, they flocked to him. Finally, he had the power and wealth he so desired.  - Lycia, the Heretic
title.Mods: Duplicates up to 4 random Offer Rewards upon defeating the Herald of the Scourge,Cannot recover Resolve,Cannot be used with Forbidden Tomes below level 75,This item is destroyed when applied to a Sanctum

title.name: The Gluttonous Tide
title.flavour text: To eat, to feast, to forget the horror of endless agonizing existence if but for a moment... only to disgorge and do it all again...
title.Mods: (120-160)% increased Physical Damage,(16-20)% increased Attack Speed,Lose all Frenzy Charges on reaching Maximum Frenzy Charges to make the next Bow Attack you perform fire that many additional Arrows,+(30-50)% Global Critical Strike Multiplier while you have a Frenzy Charge,(20-40)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

title.name: The Goddess Bound
title.flavour text: She paints her offer in wicked hues An off-white grin, an elegant bruise. To the nascent scourge she sings the ruse:  With me in hand, what else need you use?
title.Mods: +1 to Level of Socketed Melee Gems,Uses both hand slots,(250-300)% increased Physical Damage,Adds 3 to 7 Fire Damage,20% increased Attack Speed,30% increased Global Critical Strike Chance,+(20-40) to Evasion Rating,20% reduced Rarity of Items found,30% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life,+25% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier

title.name: The Goddess Scorned
title.flavour text: Her purpose seems done; the oath is fulfilled. Rust dulls her smirk with the last demon killed. The embers grow dim and yet hope burns her lips:  An old flame renewed can define our eclipse!
title.Mods: Uses both hand slots,(250-300)% increased Physical Damage,(90-110)% increased Critical Strike Chance,+(20-30)% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier,+(40-50)% to Fire Resistance,Cannot be Ignited,100% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage,Ignites you inflict deal Damage 50% faster,You can only deal Damage with this Weapon or Ignite,+190 to Accuracy Rating

title.name: The Goddess Unleashed
title.flavour text: As a maiden I was bound; as a crone was I scorned Promised power rarely found, delivered fury fairly thorned. Not enough?...Fine. Now I am become both and another To take your hand and cradle your talents, not smother The consummate flames. So hush, dear, say not a word.  Bequeathed, betrayed...beloved. At last, I am the third.
title.Mods: Uses both hand slots,Item has 6 Sockets and is fully linked (Hidden),Adds (3-6) to (33-66) Physical Damage,(44-66)% increased Critical Strike Chance,33% increased Ignite Duration on Enemies,Gain (66-99)% of Sword Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage,Gain Her Blessing for 3 seconds when you Ignite an Enemy,33% chance to Blind nearby Enemies when gaining Her Blessing,100% chance to Avoid being Ignited, Chilled or Frozen with Her Blessing,20% increased Attack and Movement Speed with Her Blessing,+475 to Accuracy Rating

title.name: The Golden Rule
title.flavour text: Hurt as you would be hurt.
title.Mods: (30-40)% increased Armour while Bleeding,Bleeding you inflict is Reflected to you,+1% to Chaos Resistance per Poison on you,Poison you inflict is Reflected to you if you have fewer than 100 Poisons on you

title.name: The Green Dream
title.flavour text: We climb like vines up Chayula's arms, reaching into the world that should be ours.  <span class= tc -help >This item can be transformed with a [[Blessing of Chayula]]</span>
title.Mods: Gain (6-10)% of Cold Damage as Extra Chaos Damage,Passives granting Cold Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius also grant an equal chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill

title.name: The Green Nightmare
title.flavour text: We take root in the dirt and strangle those who tread upon it.
title.Mods: Gain (6-10)% of Cold Damage as Extra Chaos Damage,Passives granting Cold Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius also grant Chance to Suppress Spell Damage at 70% of its value

title.name: The Grey Spire
title.flavour text: There was never a simpler time. Just simpler motivations.
title.Mods: Has no Sockets,(250-300)% increased Global Damage,(20-30)% increased Attack Speed,+(1-4)% to all maximum Resistances,+20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

title.name: The Gryphon
title.flavour text: The gryphon knows only the hunt and the flight.
title.Mods: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 2 Chance to Flee,(170-190)% increased Physical Damage,Adds (10-15) to (25-30) Physical Damage,+(10-15) to maximum Life,Gain (5-7) Life per Enemy Killed,10% increased Movement Speed,15% increased Movement Speed if you've Killed Recently

title.name: The Gull
title.flavour text: It is the Gull that delivers Man unto Ancestor. The consumer of our flesh. The seeder of our souls unto the earth. We give the Gull his life. The Gull gives us our Way.  - Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom
title.Mods: Trigger Level 1 Create Lesser Shrine when you Kill an Enemy,(120-150)% increased Evasion and Energy Shield,+(30-45) to maximum Energy Shield,+(60-80) to maximum Life,+(30-40)% to Cold Resistance,75% increased Effect of Shrine Buffs on you,50% increased Duration of Shrine Effects on you

title.name: The Halcyon
title.flavour text: We wait, still as the dead. To join the great avalanche.  <span class= tc -help >This item can be transformed with a [[Blessing of Tul]]</span>
title.Mods: Freezes you inflict spread to other Enemies within 15 metres,+(35-40)% to Cold Resistance,30% increased Freeze Duration on Enemies,10% chance to Freeze,60% increased Damage if you've Frozen an Enemy Recently,+(20-30) to Dexterity

title.name: The Harvest
title.flavour text: Let it grow and gather inside them, Let it flow through their veins. Don't waste a drop.
title.Mods: (120-140)% increased Physical Damage,1.2% of Damage Leeched as Life on Critical Strike,3% increased Global Critical Strike Chance per Level,Gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike

title.name: The Hidden Blade
title.flavour text: The shadow warrior moves like the wind; his strikes land long after he is gone.
title.Mods: Trigger Level 20 Unseen Strike every 0.5 seconds while Phasing,+(20-40) to Dexterity,(230-260)% increased Physical Damage,30% reduced Attack Speed while Phasing,30% increased Global Critical Strike Chance

title.name: The Highwayman
title.flavour text: Somebody does have to get hurt.
title.Mods: (15-25)% increased Rarity of Items found,1% of Damage Leeched as Life,(5-10)% increased Movement Speed,Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit,Total Recovery per second from Life Leech is Doubled,(6-15)% increased Rarity of Items found

title.name: The Hollow-Eyed Skull
title.flavour text: Destruction incarnate leaves a bitter aftertaste as one soul is imbued with remnants of another, and the earth is salted by rivers of blood.
title.Mods: Empowers +(40-70) Enemies,When a Character Kills an Empowered Rare Monster, they gain its Modifiers for 20 seconds

title.name: The Hour of Divinity
title.flavour text: They ascended together, one unwillingly. The vilified became black as coal, and the lauded, golden. After a lifetime of ambition, he finally had his heart's desire. It only cost him his brother.  - Lycia, the Heretic
title.Mods: Duplicates up to 2 random Offer Rewards upon defeating the Herald of the Scourge,Cannot have Boons,This item is destroyed when applied to a Sanctum

title.name: The Hungry Loop
title.flavour text: Be careful where you put your finger.

title.name: Yriel's Fostering
title.flavour text: Feed a beast and it will not hunt. Protect it and it will not fight. Ferocity must be learned, not taught. It is suffering that forges the greatest warriors.
title.Mods: Grants Level 20 Summon Bestial Snake Skill,+(300-400) to Accuracy Rating,(130-150)% increased Evasion Rating,+(90-100) to maximum Life,Projectile Attack Skills have (40-60)% increased Critical Strike Chance,Projectiles from Attacks have 20% chance to Poison on Hit while you have a Bestial Minion,Adds (13-19) to (23-29) Chaos Damage to Attacks while you have a Bestial Minion,Grants Level 20 Summon Bestial Rhoa Skill,+(300-400) to Accuracy Rating,(130-150)% increased Evasion Rating,+(90-100) to maximum Life,Projectile Attack Skills have (40-60)% increased Critical Strike Chance,Projectiles from Attacks have 20% chance to Maim on Hit while you have a Bestial Minion,(10-15)% increased Attack and Movement Speed while you have a Bestial Minion,Grants Level 20 Summon Bestial Ursa Skill,+(300-400) to Accuracy Rating,(130-150)% increased Evasion Rating,+(90-100) to maximum Life,Projectile Attack Skills have (40-60)% increased Critical Strike Chance,Projectiles from Attacks have 20% chance to inflict Bleeding on Hit while you have a Bestial Minion,Adds (11-16) to (21-25) Physical Damage to Attacks while you have a Bestial Minion

title.name: Zahndethus' Cassock
title.flavour text: When dead men rise and darkness falls Only faith can be your walls Walls of Light, not of brick Twice as strong and twice as thick
title.Mods: Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks,(125-150)% increased Energy Shield,+(40-50)% to Chaos Resistance,25% increased Light Radius,100% chance to create Consecrated Ground when you Block Consecrated Ground regenerates 6% Life per second (Hidden) Consecrated Ground has a radius of 18 (Hidden)

title.name: Zeel's Amplifier
title.flavour text: Great minds wish to reveal all the secrets of time and space. But it does not matter. Creation, the act of Matter Metamorphosis, is the only secret worth discovering.  - Zeel, Vaal Tinkerer
title.Mods: (40-50)% increased Spell Damage,+(60-80) to maximum Energy Shield,+(50-70) to maximum Life,1% increased Area of Effect per Enemy killed recently, up to 50%,You have Zealot's Oath if you haven't been hit recently,+5% chance to Suppress Spell Damage

title.name: Zerphi's Heart
title.flavour text: We are incapable of change without sacrifice, for we are both the iron and the forge.
title.Mods: Adds (48-53) to (58-60) Chaos Damage,Items and Gems have 50% increased Attribute Requirements,Chaos Damage can Ignite, Chill and Shock,Gain Soul Eater for 20 seconds when you use a Vaal Skill,(20-30)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate

title.name: Zerphi's Last Breath
title.flavour text: Proof that if you devote yourself to a god of death, you may be spared from its wrath.  - Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 408
title.Mods: (-10-10)% increased Charges per use,Grants Last Breath when you Use a Skill during Effect, for (450-600)% of Mana Cost

title.name: Zerphi's Youth
title.flavour text: There is no price you can give eternal life that some would not pay.
title.Mods: With 5 Corrupted Items Equipped: Gain Soul Eater for 10 seconds on Vaal Skill use
